Back to Sergei Rachmaninoff

Sergei Rachmaninoff

Liebesleid (Fritz Kreisler)

c. 1921 · Threlfall and Norris III/5 no. 1

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of the second of Fritz Kreisler’s Alt-Wiener Tanzweisen, originally written for violin and piano.

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 4
